title: Problem Using the Stroke Tool in FontLab Studio
content: When I use the stroke tool in FontLab, I always think of the song, [Strokin' by Clarence Carter](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203110932/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=tGVnH39UzI8). You're welcome.
author: typodermic

comments.content:
:::nominating this for best Build post of the year:::

I lol'ed; thanks :-)
I didn't know that Typophile could be this much fun, Ray.
